short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cure confirmation bias with this search inverter that challenges you to consider disconfirming evidence.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The internet allows us to satisfy our confirmation bias much quicker than ever before. Use the CB search inverter to invert your searches to find disconfirming information instead of confirming information.
Just type "CB" and a space and then your search term and you'll be directed to disconfirming information.

Read more about this mini project here https://medium.com/@clavien/confirmation-bias-reaches-epidemic-how-to-save-yourself-abb69490d85f#.hwatvreyo
